name: Local Cafe Redesign
tagline: A modern and responsive website overhaul.
description: Redesigned a local cafe's website with a clean, modern aesthetic. The project focused on improving user experience, adding a dynamic menu, and optimizing for mobile devices. Implemented with HTML5, CSS3, and vanilla JavaScript.

name: E-commerce Platform
description: Developed a full-stack e-commerce platform from scratch. Key features include a robust product catalog, secure checkout, user authentication, and an admin dashboard for content management. Built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB.

name: Data Visualization Dashboard
tagline: Turning complex data into actionable insights.
description: Created a web-based dashboard for an analytics firm to visualize complex datasets. The tool features interactive charts, real-time data updates, and customizable filters. Powered by D3.js and a RESTful API.

name: Mobile App UI/UX
description: Designed and prototyped the user interface and user experience for a new fitness tracking mobile application. Focused on a clean, intuitive design that makes it easy for users to track workouts and set goals. Prototyped with Adobe XD.

name: Photography Portfolio
tagline: A minimalist site for showcasing stunning images.
description: A minimalist, high-performance portfolio website for a professional photographer. The site is optimized for fast loading of high-resolution images and features a simple, elegant gallery layout. Implemented with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.

name: Non-profit Website
tagline: Spreading awareness for a good cause.
description: Developed a new website for a non-profit organization to increase online donations and volunteer sign-ups. The site features a donation portal, event calendar, and a blog to share success stories. Built with a custom WordPress theme.

name: Interactive Landing Page
description: Designed and built an interactive landing page for a new tech product. The page includes captivating animations, a parallax scrolling effect, and a lead generation form. Developed using Vue.js and CSS animations.

name: Recipe Finder App
tagline: A fun tool for home cooks.
description: Created a single-page application that allows users to search for recipes using ingredients they have on hand. The app fetches data from a third-party recipe API and displays detailed cooking instructions. Built with React.

name: Real Estate Dashboard
tagline: Tracking market trends in real time.
description: A comprehensive dashboard for real estate agents to track property listings, market trends, and client interactions. The application uses dynamic charts and filters to provide a clear overview of the market. Built with Angular and a Firebase backend.

name: Online Resume Builder
description: An online tool that helps users create professional resumes. The application features various templates, drag-and-drop functionality, and the ability to export to PDF. Developed with vanilla JavaScript and Bootstrap.

name: Social Media Clone
description: A basic social media clone to demonstrate proficiency in front-end and back-end development. Features include user profiles, a post feed, and a commenting system. Built using a MERN stack.

name: Task Management App
tagline: Organizing your day with a simple tool.
description: A clean and simple task management application. Users can add, edit, and delete tasks, and a calendar view helps with scheduling. Utilizes local storage to persist data across sessions.

name: Restaurant Reservation System
tagline: Streamlining bookings for a popular eatery.
description: Developed a full-featured web-based reservation system for a fine-dining restaurant. The system allows customers to book tables online and provides the restaurant staff with an admin panel to manage reservations. Built with Python (Django) and JavaScript.

name: Interactive Portfolio Site
tagline: An engaging showcase for creative work.
description: This project is a highly interactive personal portfolio for a graphic designer. It features unique scrolling effects, hover animations, and a custom cursor to provide a memorable user experience. Built with a mix of vanilla JavaScript and Three.js.

name: Educational Quiz App
tagline: A fun way to learn and test knowledge.
description: An educational web application featuring customizable quizzes. The app allows users to select topics, track their scores, and view detailed feedback on their answers. Developed with React and a quiz API.
